However, it has not been previously discussed how the future trader will defend himself in case ofThe use of stop loss is not an option for the price action. Given the volatility that occurs when entering the market with prices in open market hours and macroeconomic dataHowever, we do not open a trade without an exit plan in the event of a reversal.
